question: Which of the following was the objective of appointing the Provincial Relations Committee under Lord Meston?
option1: To recommend necessary steps to restore the deficit of the central government
option2: To recommend necessary step to enhance revenue odf the provinces
option3: To recommend necessary step to settle the problem of tax evasion
answer: To recommend necessary steps to restore the deficit of the central government
explanation: The Provincial Relations Committee under Lod Meston was set up to recommend the necessary steps to restore the deficit of the central government.
